price: ሰዎችንም መሪ (ቁርኣን) በመጣላቸው ጊዜ ከማመን «አላህ ሰውን መልክተኛ አድርጎ ላከን» ማለታቸው እንጂ ሌላ አልከለከላቸውም፡፡
arabic: وَمَا مَنَعَ ٱلنَّاسَ أَن يُؤۡمِنُوٓاْ إِذۡ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ أَبَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ بَشَرٗا رَّسُولٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā manaʿa al-nāsa an yu'minū idh jāahumu al-hudā illā an qālū abaʿatha al-lahu basharan rasūlan
